python data types:
text:
 str
numeric:
 int,float,complex
sequence:
 list,tuple,range
mapping:
 dict
set:
 set,frozenset
boolean:
 bool
binary:
 bytes,bytearray,memoryview
none:
 noneType
python type casting:
int() - constructs an integer
float() - constructs a float number
str() - constructs a string
